title: Fish Bowls
summaries: The Fish Bowl, Gold Fish Bowl (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions), Pupfish Bowl (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions), and Lava Serpent Bowl (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) are decorative furniture items. The Fish Bowl and Gold Fish Bowl also double as wearable items that can be equipped in the player's helmet slot.

Fish Bowls cause only visual effects when placed in the helmet vanity slot. When instead placed in the functional head armor slot, the <linked>breath meter</linked> appears as if the player were <linked>underwater</linked>, and if worn long enough the player will <linked>drown</linked> and <linked>die</linked>. Breathing aids like the <linked>Breathing Reed</linked> or <linked>Gills Potion</linked> will allow for normal breathing when wearing the bowl.
The Fish, Gold Fish and Pupfish Bowls are crafted, while the Lava Serpent Bowl has a 39/200 (19.5%) chance of being found inside Obsidian Crates and Hellstone Crates.
